group dining &
events
Let us know about your event ideas and we will contact you with recommendations about our best options.
Ready to plan your event?
Request a proposal now
LAS VEGAS
Las Vegas
The Las Vegas Dining Room offers breathtaking aesthetics, an award-winning menu, and a causual atmosphere making it the perfect private space for intimate weddings, rehearsal dinners and social events, corporate, media or product launch events. The Private Dining Room can accommodate up to 64 guests, or be divided with an imperceptible retractable wall to retain intimacy for smaller gatherings of up to 24 or 40 guests in our east and west rooms respectively.
Up to 64 guests
3 Rooms
REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL
see group menu
lincoln road
Planning a celebration or a special event? At Havana 1957 Lincoln Road, we bring the authentic flavors of Cuba to your table with our expertly curated group menus. Designed for parties of all sizes, our menus offer a selection of traditional Cuban dishes that will delight your guests.
From the rich aroma of our slow-cooked Ropa Vieja to the vibrant zest of our Mojitos, each dish reflects the passion and heritage of Cuban cuisine. Whether its a corporate event, family gathering, or festive celebration, our dedicated team ensures a memorable dining experience in the heart of Miami Beach.
REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL
see group menu
ocean drive (940)
Host your next event at Havana 1957, located in the iconic Breakwater Hotel, where the charm of Old Havana meets the vibrant energy of Miami Beach. Our group menus are thoughtfully designed to bring authentic Cuban flavors to your celebrations, offering a diverse selection of dishes that reflect Cubas rich culinary heritage.
Whether youre planning an intimate gathering, a corporate event, or a large celebration, our group menus feature crowd-pleasing favorites like Lech贸n Asado, Pollo a la Plancha, and our signature cocktails, including the irresistible Mojito Cubano. Paired with our warm hospitality and lively atmosphere, your event will be unforgettable.

espanola way
Immerse your guests in the heart of Cuban tradition at Havana 1957, located on the picturesque Espa帽ola Way. Perfect for group gatherings, our menus are thoughtfully curated to bring the vibrant flavors of Cuba to your special occasions.
Enjoy iconic dishes like Ropa Vieja, Mojo-Marinated Lech贸n Asado, and our famous Havana 1957 Chicken, all crafted with authentic recipes that transport you to Old Havana. Whether youre planning a family celebration, a corporate event, or a festive soir茅e, our lively atmosphere and exceptional service make every moment unforgettable.
REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL
see group menu
pembroke pines
Host your next gathering at Havana 1957 in Pembroke Pines, where the warmth of Cuban hospitality meets the bold flavors of traditional cuisine. Our group menus are designed to make every celebration special, offering a variety of authentic dishes that cater to all tastes.
Savor Cuban classics like Lech贸n Asado, Vaca Frita, and our signature Havana 1957 Chicken, paired with refreshing Mojitos or handpicked wines. Whether its a birthday, corporate meeting, or family reunion, our inviting atmosphere and attentive service ensure an unforgettable dining experience.
Plan your event with us today and let Havana 1957 Pembroke Pines create a memorable Cuban-inspired celebration for you and your guests.

about us
Havana 1957 is a new chain of Cuban restaurants unlike other traditional Cuban restaurants. It sets itself apart by creating a unique dining experience that allows you to spend Un Dia En La Habana and relive the glory and glamour of old Cuba during the 1950s.
Each of our five restaurants combines the flavors of authentic Cuban cuisine, classic Cuban music and vintage memorabilia bringing Cuban Nostalgia to each neighborhood.
Havanas biggest legends and famous prints decorate the restaurant from ceiling to floor, yet one of the most outstanding features of the restaurant is The Mojito Bar.
The Mojito Bar stocks over 120 varieties of rum from around the world. Here, guests can spend their day in Havana sipping a Cuba Libre or our famous Mojito cocktail, while listening to Classic Cuban artists such as Celia Cruz and Benny More.
BOOK NOW
OR
ORDER ONLINE
